Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Navigate to the person from the preconditions
Home page displays: Person Page displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Choose the action menu in the upper right hand corner
Home page displays: “Non-MAGI Conversion Wizard” is listed as an option

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Choose the “Non-MAGI Conversion Wizard”
Home page displays: the conversion wizard displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Enter the MEDS Household Number associated to the case from the preconditions both Household Number fields
Home page displays: Both fields are populated

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Select Next
Home page displays: The second page of the conversion wizard displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Verify that the second page list all details for the members in the household
Home page displays:
The second wizard page lists the member details for all members in the MEDS Household. The following member information must be displayed for each member:
-	Member Name – This must include the First Name, Middle Name, Last Name and Suffix
-	SSN
-	DOB
-	Medicare Number 
-	MBI Number
-	Payment Category Number (if currently eligible/previously eligible in the last 90 days)
-	Eligibility Start and End Date (if currently eligible/previously eligible in the last 90 days)

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Check all members and Click next
Home page displays: Conversion IEG "Before We Start" screen appears and functions the same as the CGIS Intake Application IEG Script

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Choose "0001 No Sponsored Site" for sponsored site and no for "Is the application submitted by an Authorized Representative?" and select next
Home page displays: "About the applicant" screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Navigate to the About the applicant screen and click next
Home page displays: Applicant Details screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: click next
Home page displays: Review the Applicant answers screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: click next
Home page displays: the general information screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Navigate through the general information screen
Home page displays: Review the Applicant answers screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: click next
Home page displays: Benefit information screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Navigate through the Benefit information screen
Home page displays: Review the Applicant answers screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: click next
Home page displays: Employment information screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Navigate through the employment information screen, enter the applicants employment details and click next
Home page displays: Income information screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Navigate through the Income information screen, enter the applicants income information and click next
Home page displays: Review The Applicant's Answers screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: click next
Home page displays: Resource General Information screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Navigate through the Resource General Information screen
Home page displays: Review The Applicant's Answers screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: click next
Home page displays: Expenses Information screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Navigate through the Expenses Information screen
Home page displays: Review The Applicant's Answers screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: click next
Home page displays: Review The Applicant's Answers screen displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Click next and submit the application
Home page displays: application is submitted

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Navigate to the person page for the primary member
Home page displays: person page displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Navigate to the evidence tab
Home page displays: Evidence tab displays

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Verify the the Identification evidence of type SSCN
Home page displays: The existing evidence is end dated and a new evidence of the same type is created with the value received from MEDS

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Repeat steps 1 to 27 for a member having Identifications evidence of type Medicare Number with a value which is different from MEDS
Home page displays: The existing evidence is end dated and a new evidence of the same type is created with the value received from MEDS

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Repeat steps 1 to 27 for a member having Identifications evidence of type Household Number with a value which is different from MEDS
Home page displays: The existing evidence is end dated and a new evidence of the same type is created with the value received from MEDS

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Repeat steps 1 to 27 for a member having Identifications evidence of type Budget Group Number with a value which is different from MEDS
Home page displays: The existing evidence is end dated and a new evidence of the same type is created with the value received from MEDS

Log into the Worker Portal as a SCEligib: Repeat steps 1 to 27 for a member having Identifications evidence of type MBI Number with a value which is different from MEDS
Home page displays: The existing evidence is end dated and a new evidence of the same type is created with the value received from MEDS
